text.data-name:
- Background* will be scrolling slowly while the logo floats static in the middle. *Background will be screenshots of 7days and ARK.
- 7Days and Ark Boxes will highlight and slightly increase in size upon mouseover hover.
text.tspan: - Background* will be scrolling slowly while the logo floats static in the middle.
*Background will be screenshots of 7days and ARK.
- 7Days and Ark Boxes will highlight and slightly increase in size upon mouseover hover.
